name: 1-bit World Builder
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Use different blocks to create world/level you like.

 You got wide range from building blocks to rocks,

 animals, plants, some extra blocks. Create the tallest

 tower or lighthouse, maybe a castle or just play around

 and see where imagination takes you.

entry for wonderjam 1 (theme: build)

made in 7 days
